sections.title: Getting Started
sections.description: Quick start guides and installation instructions.

pages.title: Introduction
pages.description: Beautifully designed components built with Angular CDK and Tailwind CSS.

pages.title: Installation
pages.description: How to install and set up Semantic Components.

pages.title: Typography
pages.description: Styles for headings, paragraphs, lists...etc.

pages.title: Accordion
pages.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.

pages.title: Alert
pages.description: Displays a callout for user attention.

pages.title: Alert Dialog
pages.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.

pages.title: Aspect Ratio
pages.description: Displays content within a desired ratio.

pages.title: Avatar
pages.description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user.

pages.title: Badge
pages.description: Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge.

pages.title: Breadcrumb
pages.description: Displays the path to the current resource using a hierarchy of links.

pages.title: Button
pages.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.

pages.title: Calendar
pages.description: A date field component that allows users to enter and edit date.

pages.title: Card
pages.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.

pages.title: Carousel
pages.description: A carousel with motion and swipe built using Embla.

pages.title: Chart
pages.description: Beautiful charts. Built using chart.js.

pages.title: Checkbox
pages.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

pages.title: Checkbox Group
pages.description: Provides shared state to a series of checkboxes.

pages.title: Collapsible
pages.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.

pages.title: Combobox
pages.description: Autocomplete input and command palette with a list of suggestions.

pages.title: Date Picker
pages.description: A date picker component.

pages.title: Dialog
pages.description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window, rendering the content underneath inert.

pages.title: Editor
pages.description: An editor using Tiptap.

pages.title: Hover Card
pages.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

pages.title: Input
pages.description: Displays a form input field or a component that looks like an input field.

pages.title: Input OTP
pages.description: Accessible one-time password component with copy paste functionality.

pages.title: Pagination
pages.description: Pagination with page navigation, next and previous links.

pages.title: Progress
pages.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.

pages.title: Select
pages.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.

pages.title: Separator
pages.description: Visually or semantically separates content.

pages.title: Sheet
pages.description: Extends the Dialog component to display content that complements the main content of the screen.

pages.title: Skeleton
pages.description: Use to show a placeholder while content is loading.

pages.title: Slider
pages.description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.

pages.title: Switch
pages.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

pages.title: Table
pages.description: A responsive table component.

pages.title: Tabs
pages.description: A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time.

pages.title: Textarea
pages.description: Displays a form textarea or a component that looks like a textarea.

pages.title: Toast
pages.description: A succinct message that is displayed temporarily.

pages.title: Toggle
pages.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off.

pages.title: Toggle Group
pages.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.

pages.title: Tooltip
pages.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.
